sentences.en: A slight higher predominance of leukemia in males than females . 3.
sentences.cn: (慢性骨髓性白血病除外)2.男性罹患率较女性高.

sentences.en: Acute leukemia ( AL ) is a serious danger to the mankind.
sentences.cn: 急性白血病 ( AL ) 是严重危害人类健康和生命的重大疾病.

sentences.en: Acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) is a clonal and heterogeneous disease characterized by a myriad of genetic defects.
sentences.cn: 急性髓性白血病 ( acutemyeloid leukemia, AML ) 是一类起源于造血干细胞的、以大量遗传缺陷为特征的异质性恶性血液病.

sentences.en: Children are children, whether they have leukemia or not.
sentences.cn: 孩子就是孩子，不管他们是否有白血病。

sentences.en: However, the residuary leukemia cells of autogenous graft can cause leukemia relapse.
sentences.cn: 然而, 自体移植物中残留的白血病细胞可引起白血病复发.

sentences.en: If you dug up an old medical book from the sixties, it would tell you that childhood leukemia is incurable.
sentences.cn: 如果找一本20世纪60年代的旧医学书出来的话，它会告诉你儿童白血病是不治之症。

sentences.en: Imatinib is currently the most popular therapy for chronic myeloid leukemia ( CML ).
sentences.cn: 伊马替尼是目前治疗慢性髓细胞 白血病 的最普遍药物.

sentences.en: In two years'time, I will be able to cure children's leukemia.
sentences.cn: 在两年内, 我将治好小儿白血病.

sentences.en: Leukemia is a malignant hematopoietic system, is the most common malignant one.
sentences.cn: 白血病是造血系统的恶性肿瘤, 是我国最常见的恶性肿瘤之一.

sentences.en: Lymph node enlargement occurs early in chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
sentences.cn: 慢性淋巴细胞性白血病,出现淋巴结肿大较早.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the diagnosis, treatment and prognosis of chronic neutrophilic leukemia ( CNL ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨慢性中性粒细胞白血病 ( CNL ) 的诊断 、 治疗和预后.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe the apoptosis - inducing effects of dopamine on K 562 leukemia cells.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察多巴胺对白血病细胞系K562的诱导凋亡作用.

sentences.en: Objective: To define the diagnostic criteria of eosinophilic leukemia ( EoL ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨嗜酸粒细胞白血病 ( EoL ) 的诊断标准.

sentences.en: The bcr - abl fusion gene is the characteristic gene of chronic myeloid leukemia ( CML ).
sentences.cn: 慢性粒细胞白血病 ( Chronicmyeloid leukemia, CML ) 具有特征性的bcr-abl 融合基因.

sentences.en: There are some we think may contribute, but as you know, we give a lot of different medications, particularly in children with leukemia.
sentences.cn: 有一些我们认为可能有贡献，但如你所知，我们开了很多不同的药物，特别是给有白血病的儿童。

sentences.en: There is little doubt that exposure to ELF causes childhood leukemia.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑,暴露于低频电磁场可引起儿童白血病.

sentences.en: Unlike the other three types of leukemia, some patients with CLL may have disease that does not progress for a long time.
sentences.cn: 与其他三种类型的白血病不同，慢性淋巴细胞白血病患者可能会有一些持续时间不长的病症。

words.tran_cn: 白血球增多；[内科] 白细胞增多

phrases.tran_cn: 急性淋巴细胞白血病；急性淋巴细菌性白血病
慢性骨髓白血病；慢性粒细胞白血病
淋巴细胞性白血病；淋巴球性白血病

trans.tran_en: a type of cancer of the blood, that causes weakness and sometimes death
